column4: is adding kdrive to the next release something i would probly be better off bringing up in the mailing list?
why would you like to have kdrive? I used it and it is not *that* special
when your on a k6-2 300 it is
how much memory do you have
that's not very much maybe you shouldn't use gnome then
what I didn't like about kdrive is that (as far as I can tell) the refreshrate 60hz is, after an hour it will make your eyes fall out
ah, then t might be ok, what graphiccard?
well it is a small package, you should maybe ask on ubuntu-devel
I use a p133 laptop, so 300 is *wow*
I used it on my desktop, my laptop is not vesa-compliant :(
what did you change, you wrote it down but it scrolled of my screen
that is already quite nice, it is easier to see, I liked that about fedora
